name: num::<impl u16>::highest_one

num::nonzero::NonZero::<T>::new.doc: Creates a non-zero if the given value is not zero.

option::Option: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 26274, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 24832, name: "num::nonzero::NonZero" }), GenericArgs([Type(Ty { id: 136, kind: RigidTy(Uint(U16)) })]))) })])

doc:
Returns the index of the highest bit set to one in `self`, or `None`
 if `self` is `0`.
